result.title: First Round
result.content:
Dear All,

The plan is the following, we are going to post some problems (15-20) problems every 2 weeks. You will have 10 days to try and solve as much as you can and then we will post editorials after which you will have 4 days to solve what you left after reading the editorial.

The number of problems we add each week will change based on the performance. We will try to hold occasional Q&A sessions to answer your questions in case the editorials are not enough.

You will find the first round defined in the contests tab and running for 2 weeks so please register in it.

You can use the normal submit but to read the problems you can get the statement here

Please do your best and give it enough attention :)

Good Luck and Have Fun :)
